abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column describes ordeal experienced by 13-year-old Luna Raposo-Dean, who was picked up by police near Port Authority Bus Terminal as possible runaway while on her way to after-school music lesson; holds procedure for checking possible runaways is stressful to children and suggests that turf issues between Port Authority police and New York City police may preclude simpler solutions.
lead_paragraph: Luna Raposo-Dean, 13, just wanted to get to her drum lesson, but an officer insisted on some by-the-book interference.

headline.main: Stop and Quiz: Police Cast a Net for Runaways
headline.print_headline: Stop and Quiz: Casting a Net for Runaways

snippet: Luna Raposo-Dean, 13, just wanted to get to her drum lesson, but an officer insisted on some by-the-book interference.

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
